resources.string: Medical leg measurement and 3D cast design for CMT patients using camera vision and ruler reference
This is a prototype medical device. Always consult with qualified medical professionals before using any orthotic device.
Position a standard ruler (30cm/12in) vertically next to your leg
Ensure the ruler is clearly visible and parallel to your leg
Capture multiple angles: front, side, back, and detail views
Keep lighting consistent and avoid shadows on the ruler
Charcot-Marie-Tooth (CMT) is a genetic disorder affecting peripheral nerves, often causing foot drop and ankle weakness.
This custom cast is designed to provide ankle support and assist with weight distribution for CMT patients.
